评论详情: Sweater is very oversized, if questioning sizes, size down.  Soft,  great length, not tight on arms or shoulders. Works great dressed up or down.  Perfect color for the holidays.

评论概述: I love the fit and the quality is pretty good!

评论详情: This is a very cute sweater. I got lots of compliments. It can be worn tied or open and is equally adorable. The color is vibrant and unique too.
Color is super cute and on trend for Fall in NY, I ordered a medium, returned for smaller size. Material was soft and not itchy, very cute sweater

This will be good for probably one machine wash before it looses its shape since it’s a SHEIN item (I see the inside tag has been cut off). However item is cute and will be good for the one time wear.
Looks better than the product image, it has a nice weight to it. Kinda on the oversized side of things and warm. Love love!
This sweater is really cute, the quality seems okay but for the price it’s worth it!
It's very thick and looks very nice quality.  Fits true to size.  I got a medium and normally wear medium.
Looks very cute and it is quite more warm
Bought for our daughter in law... she loved it!
It's a bit shorter hits at the waste (I'm 5'6  order Small)  but it's super cozy and soft . Looks very nice
This fits extremely large. I would suggest arresting at least two Sizes smaller than regular size. Quality is just “meh”. I wil Be sending back when the postage strike ends.
Good quality for the prize, the tissue is really soft and the color is cute (I bought a pink one)! I would recommend!
